Question
========
  
One problem to consider when choosing a within-subjects design as a researcher is: 
Answerlist
----------
* That you need fewer people than in a similar between-subjects design.
* That you have to deal with the problems of sequence effects.
* That you examine different groups of participants at each level of the independent variable.
* That you need at least three different groups of participants.
